title: Bobby Makes Eddie Uncomfortable + Raymundo Gets A Response From Subway CEO +  Fun Fact Friday Face-Off: Amy vs. Phone Screener Abby
itunes:title: Bobby Makes Eddie Uncomfortable + Raymundo Gets A Response From Subway CEO +  Fun Fact Friday Face-Off: Amy vs. Phone Screener Abby
description:
Bobby plays a clip from his BobbyCast with Scott Stapp of Creed that makes Eddie uncomfortable for being a hater of his band. Raymundo sent an email to the CEO of Subway after it was revealed their tuna has some alleged controversy. He shares their response. Amy (The Queen of Facts) takes on a new opponent to see if she can remain undefeated. She battles against our Phone Screener Abby.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
